entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
